name: Bloody Shooting
description:
Bloody Shooting let you make a big slaughter with zombies.

Like first person shooter, there is an adventure that immerse player in a story of twisted reality, and there is a free mode that allow player to compose levels and make soft gameplay or a big disaster as he like. Combat can be fast and exciting with various kind of enemies.

Game mode.

  • You are immersed in a story and meet some strange characters in the adventure. The progress unlock levels and objects that enrich the gameplay.
  •  You have 7 playgrounds in free mode on which you can choose objects, animals and zombies you want to knockout.

Control (Standard FPS)

  • Rotate the view by the mouse mouvement.
  • Fire by left click.
  • Swap weapon by wheel mouse.

Minimal configuration

The game is configured for working in low config, so this minimal config don't represent the lowest config it can work, but only the lowest config we have tested yet.

  • System: Windows system (or wine on linux)
  • Prossessor: 1Ghz Intel pentium III
  • RAM: 512 Mb
  • Graphic card: SiS 630/730 (16 Mb)
  • Space free disk: 106 Mb

Hope you like this game, report and comment are wellcome!
